name: oem_user_order_service_diagnosis
alias: 用户订单服务诊断作业(内置)
description: 用户订单服务诊断作业

taskIdList.name: oem_user_order_service_unavailable
taskIdList.alias: 用户订单服务不可用(内置)
taskIdList.execContent:
# coding: utf-8

import time
import json
import os


def build_self_healing_instance():
    incident_instance = json.loads(open(os.getenv("varConfPath")).read())
    incident_instance["selfHealingStatus"] = "RUNNING"
    incident_instance["gmtSelfHealingStart"] = int(time.time())
    time.sleep(20)
    return incident_instance


def build_new_instance(app_instance_id):
    new_incident_instance = {
        "appInstanceId": app_instance_id,
        "appComponentInstanceId": app_instance_id,
        "cause": "[用户订单服务异常诊断]交易服务异常引起订单服务异常,生成交易服务异常实例"
    }
    return new_incident_instance


def incident():
    # 当前异常实例
    current_incident = build_self_healing_instance()
    # 自愈依赖新的异常实例
    next_incident = build_new_instance(current_incident["appInstanceId"])

    result = {
        "currentIncident": current_incident,
        "nextIncident": next_incident
    }
    open(os.getenv("varConfPath"), 'w').write(json.dumps(result))
    print(json.dumps(result))


incident()
